message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to come down to $110?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125.
